ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: New papers on evolving adaptive neural networks

Hi Andy,

That sounds like an interesting idea but we haven't tried it yet.=
 Were you
thinking about specific sub-networks that deal with adaptation in=
 some way?

Best,
Sebastian
